document.full_text: three current and former waiters who served fans in premium seats at yankee stadium have filed a lawsuit against their employer over the withholding of tips automatically charged on food and drink orders.
document.title: yankee stadium concession workers sue over tips
lines_and_colors: three current and former waiters who served fans in premium seats at yankee stadium have filed a lawsuit against their employer over the withholding of tips automatically charged on food and drink orders.
